post_title: Looking for These Polar Bear's to Complete Set
post_content:
I am just five cards away from completing my Polar Bear back run set and wanted to see if anyone has 2 of the 5 that I am missing. 

Jimmy Collins
Hooks Wiltse port

The other three that I need are 

Cobb port
Demmitt 
O'Hara 

I would be interested in any Cobb's that you might have as well. I don't really care what the front looks like but looking for clean backs for the set. Thanks!
